data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Baloda Bazar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 26,082 who are far from you in Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 294 believers living in Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Baloda Bazar to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Gandia people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the county of Baloda Bazar, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 26,700.

We estimate Baloda Bazar has 294 people who might know Jesus, 324 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 26,082 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Baloda Bazar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
